alert.note: Alert for Pinal (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 27 at 4:52PM MST until August 27 at 5:30PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: The National Weather Service in Phoenix has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Pinal County in southeastern Arizona... * Until 530 PM MST. * At 452 PM MST, a severe thunderstorm was located near Kings Ranch, or near Gold Canyon, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Superior, Gold Canyon, Queen Valley, Superstition Mountains, Gold Camp, Kings Ranch and Boyce Thompson Arboretum. This includes the following highways... US Highway 60 between mile markers 202 and 211, and between mile markers 213 and 228. AZ Route 177 near mile marker 167. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
